post0.title: _steps To Add Translation To A Youtube Video
post0.content: Login to youtube . Select a video you want add translation to . Click three dots and select ‘add translations . . Click on `Switch language’ and select language you want to add translation for . . Autotranslate is a good starting point . . Option: credit my contribution . . In the editor you can play, stop video and edit subtitles (a draft is auto saved so you can come back later to finish the translation) . . Once finished, submit the translation to the owner of the video for approval. Congratulations! .

page1.title: About Me
page1.content: This is where you put the contents of your About page. Like all your pages, it’s in Markdown format. . This website is powered by fastpages 1. . a blogging platform that natively supports Jupyter notebooks in addition to other formats. ↩ . |
